name: DiceHop
description:
DiceHop was made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022, themed "Roll of the Dice"

GAMEPLAY:

A prompt in the upper left corner of the screen will indicate what number you must land on.

Use W/A/S/D keys to roll the die. 

Use [SPACEBAR] to jump! 

When you land, you won't be able to move for a short time as the die comes to a rest. If you got the right number, you will earn 1 point. 

See how high of a score you can get!
